column1: Angelica Baggins was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Angelica was the daughter of Ponto Baggins II
column2: the grand-niece three times removed of Bilbo Baggins. Though her relationship with Bilbo was more distant
column3: she would call him "Uncle Bilbo". She was invited to Bilbos Farewell Party in  and received a round convex mirror as a gift because she obviously admired her appearance.

column1: As many female Hobbit names refer to flowers
column2: wikipedia:Angelica is a genus of plants with medicinal

column1: 2002: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game):
:Angelica walks around in Bywater. She is sad to see Frodo leave and complains that he is going "practically to the other end of the world" (meaning Crickhollow) unaware how right she is.
